title: Pokemon X and Y Strategy Guide- Gamer Guides [EPUB]
description:
Pokemon X and Y Strategy Guide
Author: Gamer Guides
Published: November, 2013
Publisher: gamerguides.com
Format: Retail Mobi and Epub

Reader Required:
Epub- Adobe Digital Editions, Calibre, MoonReader for Android
Mobi- Kindle app, Calibre, MoonReader for Android

Note: no PDF was available for this one, please use a reader, as above. 
Tested on the above readers on laptop and tablet with no problems. Please allow a couple seconds for the seedboxes to kick in then it should move pretty quick.
Enjoy :D
